foods.title: Kebab
foods.description: a type of cooked meat dish that originates from cuisines of the Middle East

foods.title: Shawarma
foods.description: a delightful sight of vertically mounted layered chicken or lamp meat

foods.title: Falafel
foods.description: Falafel is a Middle Eastern recipe that is basically mashed chickpeas with herbs and seasonings formed into patties and fried

foods.title: Taboleh
foods.description: a Levantine salad made mostly of finely chopped parsley, with tomatoes, mint, onion, bulgur (soaked, not cooked), and seasoned with olive oil, lemon juice, salt and sweet pepper

foods.title: Kabsa
foods.description: an Arab mixed rice dish, served on a communal platter, that originates from Saudi Arabia

foods.title: Hummus
foods.description: a Middle Eastern dip, spread, or savory dish made from cooked, mashed chickpeas blended with tahini, lemon juice, and garlic
